f9a785e6-867a-4f0c-9aea-aee450f3905c.name: Feature: Armor not interchangeable with that of humans

0f900838-965d-425d-8668-67ec1e281da9.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

d138237e-8c5d-4c66-b738-cd346c3a4736.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

c080c62f-7c8e-4afc-be66-017e280e39c4.name: 可选增益
c080c62f-7c8e-4afc-be66-017e280e39c4.notes: Roll appropriate skill to scrounge equipment for other covered skills and apply level against the penalty.  Shift rolls to avoid ill effects from mysterious artifacts by level in either direction.

12f82d3e-2c57-4573-b4bd-4e1834760017.name: 高痛阈
12f82d3e-2c57-4573-b4bd-4e1834760017.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

243082ab-8d67-4d62-a639-7aadb14afa4a.name: 幸运
243082ab-8d67-4d62-a639-7aadb14afa4a.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

f35b63ce-0c9f-4b13-999f-920c4108c3c7.name: Luck, Extraordinary
f35b63ce-0c9f-4b13-999f-920c4108c3c7.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

36c868a0-bda1-4aba-85b3-266931e5e09a.name: 标志性装备
36c868a0-bda1-4aba-85b3-266931e5e09a.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

4d2bb37f-f938-456b-bc75-1d566000dec9.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

fdb493ed-a308-4a00-ae06-f18c929d460d.name: 期待陪伴
fdb493ed-a308-4a00-ae06-f18c929d460d.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

09a51a8f-a90a-456d-a775-f187a9934f7f.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
09a51a8f-a90a-456d-a775-f187a9934f7f.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

a9d4e289-e2ef-489c-9957-8aaa6b33f80e.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

62e4a5c4-92aa-4d84-a86e-9bee4f985c2b.name: Choose five
62e4a5c4-92aa-4d84-a86e-9bee4f985c2b.notes: Take only whichever Axe/Mace skill not taken as Primary Skill

68421f2b-2c9e-4d63-9e71-9527f7518bb4.name: Or 2 points to raise one of those skills by one level

b20ead31-0348-4cb2-a989-367b6a50d58a.name: Or 2 points for another combat skill off the previous list; Or 2 points to buy another primary trade at three levels lower; or 2 points to improve one of these choices by one level

fee9dcfe-c5aa-4511-ac3d-197dc3ca81a3.name: 1 point to improve one of these choices by one level or 1 point for another secondary skill at one level lower.
